claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Soviet Union  (  -LSB- Сове́тский Сою́з , r = Sovetskiy Soyuz -RSB- -LSB- sɐ ` vʲetskʲɪj sɐˈjʉs -RSB-  )  , officially the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics  (  USSR ; Сою́з Сове́тских Социалисти́ческих Респу́блик , -LSB- sɐˈjus sɐˈvʲɛtskʲɪx sətsɨəlʲɪsˈtʲitɕɪskʲɪx rʲɪˈspublʲɪk -RSB-  )  , also known unofficially as Russia  (  -LSB- Росси́я , Rossiya , rɐˈsʲijə -RSB-  )  , was a socialist state in Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991 .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nominally a union of multiple equal national Soviet republics , its government and economy were highly centralized in a state that was unitary in most respects .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The country was a one-party federation , governed by the Communist Party with Moscow as its capital .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Soviet Union had its roots in the October Revolution of 1917 , when the Bolsheviks , led by Vladimir Lenin , overthrew the Russian Provisional Government which had replaced Tsar Nicholas II .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1922 , the Soviet Union was formed with the unification of the Russian , Transcaucasian , Ukrainian , and Byelorussian republics .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Following Lenin 's death in 1924 and a brief power struggle , Joseph Stalin came to power in the mid-1920s .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Stalin committed the state 's ideology to Marxism -- Leninism  (  which he created  )  , and initiated a centrally planned economy .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As a result , the country underwent a period of rapid industrialization and collectivization .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Political paranoia was also fomented around Stalin , and the Great Purge was carried out to remove his opponents from the Communist Party through arbitrary arrests and persecutions of many people .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Shortly before World War II , Stalin signed the Molotov -- Ribbentrop Pact agreeing to non-aggression with Nazi Germany , after which the two countries invaded Poland in September 1939 .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In June 1941 , Germany invaded the Soviet Union , opening the largest and bloodiest theater of war in history .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Soviet war casualties accounted for the highest proportion of the conflict in the effort of acquiring the upper hand over Axis forces at intense battles such as Stalingrad .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The territories overtaken by the Red Army became satellite states of the USSR .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Cold War emerged by 1947 as the Eastern Bloc which united under the Warsaw Pact in 1955 confronted the Western states which united under NATO in 1949 .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Following Stalin 's death in 1953 , a period of political and economic liberalization , known as `` de-Stalinization '' and `` Khrushchev 's Thaw '' , occurred under the leadership of Nikita Khrushchev .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Soviet Union took an early lead in the Space Race , with the first artificial satellite and the first human spaceflight .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the 1970s , there was a brief détente of relations with the United States , but tensions resumed with the Soviet -- Afghan War in 1979 .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the mid-1980s , the last Soviet leader , Mikhail Gorbachev , sought to reform and liberalize the economy through his policies of glasnost and perestroika .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Cold War ended during his tenure , and in 1989 , Soviet satellite states in Eastern Europe overthrew their respective communist governments .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: This led to the rise of strong nationalist and separatist movements inside the USSR as well .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The government initiated a referendum , boycotted by some Soviet republics , which resulted in the majority of participating citizens voting in favor of preserving the union as a renewed federation .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In August 1991 , an abortive coup d'état was attempted by Communist Party hardliners .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Russian President Boris Yeltsin played a high-profile role in facing down the coup .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On 25 December 1991 , Gorbachev resigned and the remaining twelve constituent republics emerged from the dissolution of the Soviet Union as independent post-Soviet states .

claim: The Communist Party of the Soviet Union was completely radical.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Russian Federation -- formerly the Russian SFSR -- assumed the Soviet Union 's rights and obligations and is recognized as the primary legal successor of the Soviet Union .
